feat.value: And again, they brought a jar of new wine so they could give it to the brothers a cup each.
But one of the brothers went up to the cellar.
He fled from it and suddenly the cellar fell.
They went to see because of the noise that occurred.
They found the brother laying down.
They began to scorn him, saying, “You are a lover of vain glory.
It is well that this happened to you.”
The old man embraced him, saying,
For that which he did is good.
The Lord lives so that they might not rebuild this cellar in my time.
Let the whole oikoumene know that a cellar fell in Scetis because of a cup of wine.
